name: Bidding
description: A feature that lets users take part in auctions.

name: Discounts and Offers
description: The ability to apply discounts and offers across a set of items for a period of time.

name: Gift Cards
description: Allow customers to convert cash into credit for gifting.

name: Loyalty Points
description: A feature that offers discount or rewards to customers based on engagement.

name: Shopping Cart
description: Allow customers to accumalate a list of items prior to purchase.

name: Wishlist
description: Allows customers to add their favorite items for future purchase or sharing.
